captions.text: Hey Eddheads, we have some bad news.

On the morning of Sunday 25th March 2012,
Edd Gould passed away after a six year long
battle with cancer.
Edd was taken into hospital with a fever, but was very weak from the fight and his body just gave up.

His mind however was so far from ready to
quit. He really had no idea this was the end

of his fight and so he left us without any
fear. He wasn't afraid at all.

Edd always just saw this as an inconvenience,
something that got in the way of what he really

loved to do and that was making animations
for all of you.

It's sounds cliche, but it's really all Edd
cared about. We watched him turn down a lot

of business opportunities, work and even the
chance to have a TV show a couple of times

because he knew it would a wedge between him,
you and the show. I won't go into the future

of Eddsworld right now, but what I can tell
you is that Edd left behind the first half

of the next Eddisode, a two-parter. And what
I can promise you is that and the second half.

We've been overwhelmed with the amount of
support Edd received online and through the

mail, on YouTube, Facebook, Twitter and especially
Tumblr, Deviantart, Vokle, Newgrounds, B3TA

and the Eddsworld Forums. The list just goes
on it's been amazing.

We the friends and family of Edd would like
to take this moment to thank you for keeping

him company and keeping him strong for all
the months he spent in hospital. Thank you.

His legacy though will live on. Through the
hours of animation he's created, the thousands
of people he's inspired and befriended. Including us.
Edd may be gone, but his world will keep on spinning.

Hi two members of my family and one friend have died from cancer and I know 
how hard it can be. Just thinking that the person in front of you is dying 
with only there will carrying them on.But sometimes even that's not enough 
as I'm sure was the case with Edd.But one day people are going to find a 
cure and people will stop suffering.I know it was three years ago now but 
it doesn't matter how long ago they died it still hurts when you think 
about them if you where close. Thanks﻿

comments.author: Aaron Bone (KiritoBlows)

comments.text:
Just earlier today, I was watching H2O Delirious and I found DuDuL. Then I 
found Edd Gould. Eddsworld. I watched his episode on the Snorge. And he 
made me happy when recently ive been feeling really sad. I was wondering 
why he hadnt posted in a while, or that his videos seemed a bit.. off. 
Then, while scrolling, I found he had battled cancer. The day I found out 
about him, I found out he had died. And it just broke my heart. Even though 
I will never meet him, he make me laugh, smile, and cry. And now, seeing 
the name "Eddsworld"... i feel so sad and happy at the same time. It sounds 
weird, but I feel like I have a connection with him. Even though he never 
knew I existed. R.I.P Edd, may your world keep on spinning.﻿

it because it always made me cry...especially because he died on my 11th

chills... I am still thinking to my self..."Why do these thing happen to 
such great people"...a group of my friends and I have deemed ourselves 
eddsworld characters of by how we act...I'm Tord, Elizabeth is Edd, Christa 
is Tom, and Carmen is matt...We love and miss you Edd Gould...We love 
Eddsworld, Its our life!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!﻿
